something received

sense.gloss: receiving, getting, accepting, being given
eating, drinking, having
please (give me; do for me)
coronation, crowning
thank you (for the meal just served), I receive (this meal)
coronation ceremony, enthronement
present (that one has received), gift
cannot allow (oneself) to live (with someone) under the canopy of heaven, cannot allow (the sworn enemy) to live in this world, irreconcilable (enemy)

sdata.j: ブラウンさんとお↑話↑↓はなし↓させて↑戴↑↓いただ↓く↑事↑↓こと↓はできますか？
sdata.e: May I talk to Ms. Brown?

sdata.j: 「どなたか↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓って↑戴↑↓いただ↓けませんか？」「はい。↑私↑↓わたし↓でよろしければ。」
↑塩↑↓しお↓をこちらに↑頂戴↑↓ちょうだい↓。
sdata.e: Would you pass the salt, please?

sdata.j: またメール↑頂戴↑↓ちょうだい↓。
その↑映画↑↓えいが↓はお↑涙↑↓なみだ↓↑頂戴↑↓ちょうだい↓ものだ。
sdata.e: The movie is a stereotyped sob story.

sdata.j: お↑名前↑↓なまえ↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えて↑戴↑↓いただ↓けますか。
↑弟↑↓おとうと↓がお↑金↑↓かね↓を↑頂戴↑↓ちょうだい↓と↑言↑↓い↓いました。
sdata.e: My little brother asked for some money.

sdata.j: ↑不倶戴天↑↓ふぐたいてん↓の↑敵↑↓てき↓と↑言↑↓い↓われるほど、どうしてそんなに↑嫌↑↓きら↓われたかなあ。
sdata.e: He said I was his archenemy. How did we arrive at a situation like this?

sdata.j: ↑顧問↑↓こもん↓は↑学長↑↓がくちょう↓を↑推戴↑↓すいたい↓し、↑本会↑↓ほんかい↓の↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓↑事項↑↓じこう↓に↑関↑↓かん↓し↑諮問↑↓しもん↓に↑応↑↓おう↓じる。
sdata.e: The consultant, who is under the authority of the Chancellor, gives the committee advice on important questions.

sdata.j: どなたか↑上記↑↓じょうき↓のコメントを↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑理解↑↓りかい↓できる↑言語↑↓げんご↓へ↑翻訳↑↓ほんやく↓して↑戴↑↓いただ↓けませんか？
sdata.e: Could someone translate the comment above to a language which I can understand?

words.gloss: to receive, to get, to accept, to take, to buy
to be able to receive, to be able to take, to be able to accept
